page.title: 19Withybush Gen. Hospital
page.content: This is built on the site of a war_ time Military Hospital. The modern hospital dates from 1979 when{Princess Anne}officially opened it. It consists of the main block of hospital buildings + separate quarters for the resident doctors and nurses. These are facts we have discovered about Withybush General Hospital:- {364 beds with about 250 full; {800 people are employed; {about 1400 live births per annum; {10_15 operations daily; {12 wards; {20000 casualties per annum; {about 4 baby deaths per annum. {Car_Boot Sales}are held in the main car-park for 'extra equipment' funds. {The League of Friends Assoc.}also raises much money for added 'comforts' such as the wooden seats around the land-scaped grounds & at the bus_stop.
